content: पुष्पं [पुष्प् विकाशे-अच्] {@--1@} A flower, blossom. {@--2@} The menstrual discharge; as in पुष्पवती <ab>q. v.</ab> {@--3@} A topaz. {@--4@} A disease of the eyes (albugo). {@--5@} The car or vehicle of Kubera; see पुष्पक. {@--6@} Gallantry, politeness (in love language). {@--7@} Expanding, blooming, blossoming (said to be {%<ab>m.</ab>%} in this sense).
